reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable with its cotton stretch blend material and appreciate its classic style that makes them feel sexy. Moreover, the dress is versatile, working well as both a casual dress and Wednesday Addams costume, and customers like its fit and quality. The length receives mixed feedback, with some finding it perfect while others say it's too short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Wednesday Dress
items.body: This dress fit great and it was super cute. I returned it. I bought it to wear as Wednesday for Halloween but I ended up wearing a different Wednesday costume. This one would have worked great! I just chose the other one. Read more
items.author: Elisabeth Weinstein

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely in love.
items.body: Absolutely love this dress. It's super comfortable, light weight and over all cute. Bought it to wear for Halloween (Wednesday Addams incase it wasn't obvious). Got it in Lg, and fits pretty good. I'm 5'5 175 lbs. Read more
items.author: Bianca salazar

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Dress Ever!!
items.body: I ordered this dress for a Wednesday Addams costume for Halloween and was pleasantly surprised at the top notch quality of it. The material is 95% cotton/5% spandex. Itâ€™s extremely soft, stretchy and comfortable - and an absolutely perfect thickness. It has a nice zipper on the back with a button at the top. The collar is the exact amount of pointy and the black and white colors look excellent. This is one of the best dresses Iâ€™ve gotten on Amazon. Itâ€™s lovely and looks beautiful not just for Halloween, but also for going out on a date or to dinner with friends. Itâ€™s also just the right length - not too short and not too long. Iâ€™m 5â€™7â€ and 145lbs with a 36C chest. I ordered a Large according to the online sizing chart, but it was a bit too baggy in the waist and chest, and the sleeves were too long. I ended up exchanging it for a Medium which fits wonderfully. I would absolutely recommend. Read more
items.author: MOLLY B TRUE

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fabric is a little flimsy, otherwise itâ€™s a great choice
items.body: I bought his this dress to wear for Halloween with the hopes that I could maybe wear it outside of Halloween as well on the occasion without it looking too costumey. The dress arrived earlier than expected, which I was pleased about. It fit about as I expected. I usually wear about a size 4- size 6 in a dress, so the small fit about as I expected it to. I am about 5â€™4â€ so the dress was about knee length. I looked like Wednesday Addams. The fabric was slightly flimsy, but I usually like my fabric to be a bit thicker than this dress was, but it wasnâ€™t too bad for the price. I would recommend this item for someone to buy. The dress looked nicely made. It looked like I had went to some trouble to find a specific dress with a Peter Pan collar and not like I went and just found some poorly constructed Wednesday Addams costume that I would spend $14.88 on for bad fabric and sewing. I did not want to do that. No offense to anyone who does want to do that. This is something that Iâ€™m hoping to work into my wardrobe even outside of Halloween. Even though the fabric is almost t-shirt-like, I think this could be something that I will want to try wearing every now and then. It is really just a nice dress. Maybe Iâ€™ll buy another color. Read more
items.author: A. Stuchell-Jones

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with my purchase
items.body: Great dress fit perfectly super nice quality very surprised how it fit me perfectly. I got a lot of compliments would very much recommend. Read more
items.author: Jose Gonzalez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute! Perfect for a Wednesday costume or casually!
items.body: Great and so reasonably priced for a dress! I bought for a costume and probably the easiest costume to make! The dress was great! The size was true to size. Read more
items.author: Chris Kling

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Halloween dress
items.body: Cute dress. Fits true to size guide. Read more
items.author: Amy Casa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice dress
items.body: Like most of the reviews I used this for a Wednesday Addams costume since it was cheaper and I like making costumes out of real clothes. It's also way warmer than the polyester nonsense. The fabric of the dress was a nice thickness and I could zip it up myself without a problem, though someone else did the button for me. I'm 5'3 and 145lbs, the medium fit just fine with room for a tank top underneath. The only negative I guess is that the sleeves are slightly short. I saw other reviews mention color bleed. I tried the soak someone suggested and washed it with cold water and didn't have any bleed into the collar ðŸ‘ Read more
items.author: Laura B.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Sweet Pink, Navy, Pink, Blue, Purple, Yellow, Black, Mustard, Orange, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
